Specimen Type: Peripheral blood, bone marrow aspirate, or lymph node/tissue biopsy
Purpose: To accurately identify and characterize leukemic and lymphoid cells via flow cytometry or other immunophenotyping methods.
Container: EDTA or heparin tube for blood/bone marrow; appropriate transport media for tissue biopsy
Equipment: Multi-color flow cytometer (e.g., BD FACSCanto II) with associated reagents and accessories
